Android dialogue system for customer service using prompt-based topic control and compliments generation

Dialogue system for trip planning achieved topic control using ChatGPT-API and user recognition, evaluated positively in preliminary round.

Android Dialogue System for Customer Service

I. Introduction

The paper describes a dialogue system developed for the Dialogue Robot Competition 2023, focusing on generative AI and hospitality in customer service.

  • Generative AI, such as ChatGPT, has improved the performance of dialogue systems.
  • Hospitality is crucial in customer service, and dialogue systems are expected to respond with hospitality.
  • The paper aims to construct a dialogue system with various elements of hospitality service and evaluate users.

II. Proposed System

The proposed system focuses on topic control, compliments generation, and user preference extraction.

  • Controlling Topics with ChatGPT Prompts: The system achieves topic control for trip planning by inserting text into prompts using ChatGPT.
  • Dialogue Flow: The system elicits customer requests, confirms travel plan requirements, and discusses a plan that meets the customer’s needs.
  • Function to Complement a User’s Physical Appearance: The system captures the user’s upper body image to recognize appearance characteristics and issue compliments based on estimated attributes.
  • Control Using User’s Past Speech: The system uses ChatGPT to determine sightseeing spots and create travel plans based on the user’s past utterances.
  • Overall Configuration: The overall system configuration is explained and shown in Figure 2.

III. User Evaluation and Preliminary Results

The system undergoes user evaluation, which consists of satisfaction evaluation and plan evaluation.

  • Satisfaction Evaluation includes sufficiency of information, naturalness of dialogue, satisfaction with dialogue, trustworthiness of the robot, among others.
  • Plan Evaluation assesses the feasibility of the travel plan created by the system.

IV. Conclusion

The dialogue system, leveraging ChatGPT for topic control and compliment generation, was ranked first in both satisfaction and plan ratings during the preliminary round evaluation, indicating its effectiveness in real customer environments.

The paper provides insights into the development of an Android dialogue system that harnesses the power of generative AI and hospitality in customer service, with promising preliminary results from real customer evaluations.

The paper highlights the development of a dialogue system for the Dialogue Robot Competition 2023, emphasizing the utilization of ChatGPT for topic control and compliment generation, as well as the system’s effectiveness in real customer evaluations.
